name: Streak
headline: Streak transforms Gmail into a powerful CRM
description: Streak is the only CRM integrated entirely within your Gmail inbox, and works alongside all your other G Suite applications. It can be used to track any business process including sales, partnerships, support, hiring, deal flow, and much more. Streak also includes a powerful set of email tools including email tracking, send later, snoozing, mail merge, and more.
generated_description:
**Streak: Transforming Gmail into a Powerful CRM**

Founded in 2012 as part of Y Combinator Batch S11, Streak has carved out a unique niche in the CRM landscape. It stands out by seamlessly integrating directly into Gmail, allowing users to manage various business processes from within their inbox. This clever integration means you don’t have to toggle between apps—everything you need is right there with your email. 

**What Does Streak Do?**

Streak specializes in providing a comprehensive CRM solution within Gmail. It’s tailored for various use cases: sales tracking, partnerships, hiring, deal flow, customer support, and project management. The interface is simple—think of it as a spreadsheet that’s as intuitive as it is powerful. You can add, edit, and collaborate on data easily, filter to spot bottlenecks, and keep your team's tasks organized.

Beyond the straightforward CRM functionalities, Streak comes equipped with a suite of handy email tools, such as:

- **Email tracking**: Know when your emails are opened and read.
- **Send later**: Schedule your emails to land when your recipients are most likely to engage.
- **Mail merge**: Easily send personalized emails to a group of contacts.
- **Workflows for hiring, support, sales, and more**: Tailor your email experience to suit your business’s needs.

**The Team and Recognition**

Streak currently operates with a team of around 35 employees, and has earned accolades such as Google’s Technology Partner of the Year, highlighting its robust integration with G Suite applications like Google Drive, Calendar, and Sheets.

**Target Audience and Industries**

The tool is versatile, serving various industries including venture capital, real estate, startups, small businesses, and travel agencies. Its adaptive functionality makes it suitable for anyone looking to streamline their workflow within an environment they already use daily—Gmail.

**Taking the Next Step**

If you're ready to supercharge your email experience and transform it into a powerful CRM, Streak is just a click away. You can get started for free, and in just 30 seconds, you’ll be on your way to managing your leads, projects, and communications all from Gmail.

To learn more, visit [Streak’s website](http://streak.com) or check out the [Chrome Web Store](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/streak-crm-for-gmail/pnnfemgpilpdaojpnkjdgfgbnnjojfik) to download the extension and dive into a more organized and efficient way of managing your emails and business relationships.
